sense.def:
Kadar človek
mixes two substances
, stresa dve snovi skupaj, da se dobro premešata.

seg.quote: The mug had been used for mixing flour and water.
They drink whisky mixed with beer.
If you pour this liquid too fast, it will not mix.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mixes something
, nekaj naredi tako, da več snovi zmeša ali skupaj pretrese.

A mix
je prašek, v katerem so vse snovi, ki jih potrebujemo, da nekaj naredimo. Temu prašku potem dodamo tekočino.

seg.quote: She bought a packet of cement mix.

sense.def:
A mix
dobimo tudi tako, da dve ali več stvari zmešamo skupaj.

seg.quote: We should try and keep a broad mix of subjects in our schools.
I find the mix of politics and literature very interesting.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mixes with other people
, na družabni prireditvi spozna druge ljudi in se pogovarja z njimi.

seg.quote: He was making no effort to mix.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mixes up two things or people
, dve stvari ali osebi zamenja, tako da misli, da je ena oseba ali stvar ona druga.

seg.quote: People even mix us up and greet us by each other's names.
